snippet.title: Shurican Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Kill like a ninja and die like a ninja! And by die like a ninja, I mean "explode in some weird hell-dungeon while wearing a headcrab on your butt".

Download it from Google Play: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.snoutup.shurican

This video shows a gameplay from 1.0.5 version for Android. But I magically forced a bit higher difficulty for more intense action.
